embeds.title: Wander Bots
embeds.description:
Boss Relic / The Guardian

On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots.
Gain **:e_guardian:** at the start of your turn.
*These drones find the most wonderful salvage, but require processing power to maintain.*

messages.content:
First:
Wanderbots is a nice youtuber
go watch him

second:
This relic is pretty good, but it's personally not my style, as I really like my <Recover>

embeds.title: Recover
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 1 :e_guardian: / The Guardian

Gain 5 (8) **Block:p_block:**.
**Brace** 3 (4).
Place a card from your discard pile into **Stasis.**

messages.content: it basically incentivizes drafting stasis slot gain, if you don’t have any and can’t find any the downside can be semi-significant tho
Oh yeah I think that if you don't have stasis slot gains then this relic is really bad
But falling from 3 to 1 is a lot worse than 5-6 to 3-4
yeah
5 to 3 is -40% of your stasis slots
3 to 1 is -2/3 of your stasis slots
eh my guardian strats barely use stasis
Stasis is just a universally pretty good mechanic, even in runs that don't need it, it is almost always helpful

Very harsh downside compared to other energy relics available. Stasis slot cards are very premium as only 3 of them (with one of them being package which only has a chance to give you stasis slots). Playing around this relics downside is hard which means you basically only ever want to take this if you have no stasis at all; which is quite rare for guardian.
or perhaps you have minimal stasis
like you have <Curl Up+> and that's it

embeds.title: Curl Up
embeds.description:
Basic Skill / 1 :e_guardian: / The Guardian

Place a ~~- random  -~~ card from (in) your hand into **Stasis.**
**Brace** 10 (12).

messages.content: or you have a shit ton of accelerate
which would become easier with next update
temporal shield accelerates
incinerate+ accelerates twice
Why draft accelerate when you only have one stasis slot though? Its quite likely that there is another energy relic in the boss chest too and unless its choker its going to be better then this one.
crown?
ecto?
In general stasis finds its self naturally enter decks even if your not building your deck around it; recover come to mind as an easy to take common block card that you want slots for

Evab explained this in one of his 100 Guardian Challenge videos
basically, with a stasis build, you either go hard into accelerate and make a few cards free every turn, or you go hard into stasis slots and make enormous turns where a third your deck is free
I'd take ectoplasm over this relic. Its acutally quite similar to crown, normally its a bit worse then crown is but they both restrict your play a lot.

yes
and this is why I don't like this relic
I acknowledge that others might like it more than me
I like the design of it, and I think it is fine to boss swap into, but if I already have a few stasis cards and I see this, it makes it very hard for me to take it.

I wonder if this relic would be broken if it only reduced your stasis slot by one. Currently slime boss has tar bomb which lowers your slime slots by one and its pretty good on that character. Of course guardian relies much more on its slots then slime boss does and has ways to get more of them (were as slime boss only has a single relic that can do that)
I think mwalls tried that and he said it wasn't broken?
ecto is better on downfall than normal tbh
since you get like 2/300 free souls effectively from free break
doubt
its very often 200
and u miss out on ~345 from the merchant
thats a loss of 145 compared to normal
events also give much more gold then in vanilla
ecto isnt as bad to swap into because you can just avoid the merchant but picking it from the  boss chest is pretty hard

This is really difficult to take on guardian. Stasis is such a fantastic tool to break both the card draw and energy components of the game, and defensive mode naturally lets you buy enough time to wait for cards to get out of stasis. Losing access to 2/3 of your starting stasis slots is incredibly rough, and if you are taking full advantage of stasis slots, you can often "have the 4th energy" by having 1-2 cards come out of stasis every turn. Even if you manage to bottle stasis strike (a rare) or stasis engine (uncommon), you're still taking a significant hit to the power of those cards. Part of my resistance to wander bots comes from just how incredibly strong looping cards with reroute and recover is, which is so much harder to do with less stasis slots. It also really hurts sentry blast, which is your only tool to apply weak. Is it possible to draft an automaton deck that is ok with having less stasis slots? Sure, but stasis is so universally good, and plays so nicely with the rest of guardians kits that I would really rather not be playing that deck. I think this is actually a worse boss swap than ectoplasm, tiny house, sozu, or runic dome. Probably not as bad as busted crown, but it's close.
Stasis Engine?
don't you mean <Time Capacitor>?

embeds.title: Time Capacitor
embeds.description:
Uncommon Power / 1 :e_guardian: / The Guardian

Gain 2 (3) Stasis slots.

messages.content: also dome swap is pretty good
and so is tiny house swap

Time capacitor is the card I meant, yeah. That really depends on your starter relic, and I think there are several fights in the game that make runic dome swap a nightmare. Not knowing the intent of writhing mass, gremlin leader, nemesis, the heart, snake plant, and many many others is a huge disadvantage when planning out your turn. Tiny house is a lot worse than most starter relics, you get next to nothing out if it, and you also don't get your neow bonus (common relic, rare relic). It's not awful, but it's very weak. Burning blood, ring of the snake, heart of goo, and spirit brand are all excellent
well one of them is mostly irrelevant in downfall mode
and whilst I know that runic dome writhing mass is hell, guardian is very good at blocking, and can rip off debuffs very well
<Wander Bots> buffed: Stasis slots lost 2 > 1

embeds.title: Wander Bots
embeds.description:
Boss Relic / The Guardian / Downfall

At the start of each combat, lose 1 Stasis slot.
Gain :e_guardian: at the start of your turn.
*These drones find the most wonderful salvage, but require processing power to maintain.*

messages.content: Pinned a message.
seems a lot better now
I might actually take it outside of custom endless now.
I think this is going to turn into a really good boss relic.

2 stasis slots is so much better than 1 stasis slot. If you put in one 1 cost card each turn you won't run out of stasis slots, and for heavier stasis usage you can look to <stasis strike> and the power

embeds.title: Stasis Strike
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 2 :e_guardian: / The Guardian / Downfall

Deal 15 (20) damage.
Gain 1 Stasis Slot.

messages.content: A very welcome change, losing 2 stasis slots was a huge drawback. This should feel much more takable now, that you would still want to have access to some accelerate and perhaps a copy of time capacitor or stasis strike to go with it. Boss swapping is also less dangerous for guardian, this used to be a very nasty roll, and should be far less crippling for your act 1 now.
